resources.string: Static variables are associated with each instance of the object
A private member is only accessible within the same class as it is declared
A single method call can return multiple types in Java
Calling a method is the same as defining it
The protected access modifier is accessible within package and outside the package but through inheritance only
A class can be private or protected except for nested classes.
If you are overriding any method, overridden method (i.e. declared in subclass) must not be more restrictive.
Enter your name to start taking the quiz
